definition: The Book of Changes ("I Ching")
easy/amiable/to change/to exchange/prefix corresponding to the English adjective suffix "-able" or "-ible"
surname Yi/abbr. for 易經|易经[Yi4 jing1], the Book of Changes
classics/sacred book/scripture/to pass through/to undergo/to bear/to endure/warp (textile)/longitude/menstruation/channel (TCM)/abbr. for economics 經濟|经济[jing1 ji4]
surname Jing
Ministry of Foreign Trade and Economic Cooperation (MOFTEC)
pinyin: Dui4 wai4 Mao4 yi4 Jing1 ji4 He2 zuo4 bu4

sentences.english: In Volume I had 54 units discussing Zhou I.
sentences.chinese: 卷一計有54則，討論《易經》的內容。

sentences.english: The I Ching was fully explained by Confucius.
sentences.chinese: 孔夫子對易經做了詳細的解釋。

sentences.english: When it comes to Ching, this easy word, just we laid the basis of thinking.
sentences.chinese: 說到易經，這個易字，正好奠定了我們思維的基礎。

sentences.english: If two people are of the same mind, their sharpness can cut through metal. '
sentences.chinese: 《易經》中一句話“二人同心，其利斷金”。

sentences.english: Lanhanzhi is a peculiar scholar of Yijing and Laozi.
sentences.chinese: 藍漢之是一個獨特的《易經》和《老子》學者。

sentences.english: The contents of the Book of Changes include ancient cosmological beliefs of the Chinese antedating the separate philosophical schools.
sentences.chinese: 的內容易經包括古代宇宙信仰中提前單獨的哲學學校。

sentences.english: Upon approval, MOFTEC shall issue a certificate of approval thereof.
sentences.chinese: 批准後，由對外貿易經濟合作部發給批准證書。

sentences.english: Yang house FS's theory is all based on I Ching, Yin Yang and the changes in 5 elements.
sentences.chinese: 陽宅風水的理論依據，不離易經陰陽五行的變化。

sentences.english: According to ancient classic the Book of Changes, maintaining a balance between the mind and the body is vital for health.
sentences.chinese: 根據《易經》記載，保持身心平衡是健康的要素。

sentences.english: We look at the "Book of Changes" in this beautiful Taiji diagram.
sentences.chinese: 我們看一下《易經》的這個美麗的太極圖。

sentences.english: Securities transactions on the SEHK are executed by the Automatic Order Matching and Execution System (AMS).
sentences.chinese: 聯交所的證券交易經自動對盤及成交系統進行。

sentences.english: Traditionally, the I Ching originated from the River Maps and Luo Book.
sentences.chinese: 傳統上認爲，易經出自河圖和洛書。

sentences.english: This is the most outstanding thought of the nature of law reflected in "Book of Changes".
sentences.chinese: 這是《易經》所體現的最突出的天道觀思想。

sentences.english: TheI Ching is a "reflection of the universe in miniature."
sentences.chinese: 易經是“反映了宇宙的縮影。

sentences.english: According to the usage, the symbols of yaogua are symbolic tokens of YiJing.
sentences.chinese: 《易經》卦爻符號是一種象徵符號。

definition: easy to learn
study of the Book of Changes 易經|易经[Yi4 jing1]
Wei and Jin philosophical school amalgamating Daoist and Confucian ideals/translation of metaphysics (also translated 形而上學|形而上学)
Chinese national culture/studies of ancient Chinese civilization/the Imperial College (history)
learning/knowledge/CL:個|个[ge4]
feng shui/geomancy
the Absolute or Supreme Ultimate, the source of all things according to some interpretations of Chinese mythology
The Yellow Emperor's Internal Canon, medical text c. 300 BC
philosophy/CL:個|个[ge4]
Zhuangzi (369-286 BC), Daoist author
traditional Chinese medical science/a doctor trained in Chinese medicine
etiquette/ceremonial rites
a sage/wise and holy man/virtuous ruler/Buddhist lama/wine
the Book of Dao by Laozi or Lao-Tze, the sacred text of Daoism
Buddhist doctrine/Buddhist studies
Four Books, namely: the Great Learning 大學|大学, the Doctrine of the Mean 中庸, the Analects of Confucius 論語|论语, and Mencius 孟子
to decipher/to decode/to interpret
